reception.message:
Hi {nombreHuesped},

Welcome to our Hotel!
My name is {nombreRecepcionista}. I invite you to discover our hotel services.

Thanks and enjoy your stay with us!

label.check: Please take a minute to check your profile

messageTemplate: Hi {nombreHuesped}, next we show your reservation detail corresponding to your GuestPilot reservation Id {localizer} and hotel's reservation Id {localizadorHotel}.
You have a {tipoHabitacion} room for {personas} pax in the {nombreHotel} hotel.
Your reservation is for {noches} night(s) and the start date is {entradaFormateada}.
Please click on continue button in order to complete your registration process. Thank you

hotelInfo.title: Concierge
hotelInfo.legal: In case you need anything do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to help you. Please send us a message or call us directly.
hotelInfo.emptyMsg: Please type your message and then press on the Send button
hotelInfo.successMsg: We have received your message correctly. We will contact you as soon as possible. Thank you.

error.checkinNoRealizado: In order to get access to the room service, check-in has to be completed.
error.carritoVacio: There is no product selected yet. Before checking your order please select first the products from the bottom section by pressing ( + / - ). Browse thru different categories from the top panel by pressing ( < / > )

checkout.title: Check-out express

error.mustAgree: In order to use check-out express you must accept the conditions.

checkout.success: Your check-out request has been sent out successfully.

unavailable.title: The Check-out express option is not available. You will receive a notification when the Check-out express option is enabled.

expired.title: The check-out express option is not available. Please get in touch with the Frondesk to checkout.

realizado.title: We have already done the check-out for this reservation.

legal.title: By using Express Check-out there is no need to examine the bill first. Just leave the room keys at the Frontdesk. You will receive your bill on this email address within the next 48 hours.

signature.title: Final bill will be charged on this card account number after the customer checks out without the need of a cardholder signature.

template.welcome:
Hello {nombreHuesped},
You are using our Check-out express. Great choice. Please confirm the information below is correct and fullfill anything necessary.

checkin.title: Request Check-in express

error.mustAgree: In order to request check-in express you must accept the conditions first.

checkin.success: Your check-in express request has been sent successfully.
checkin.incomplete:
Please fill in the information for each guest in the reservation.
Select '+' to open a new form. Thank you!

template.welcome:
Hi {nombreHuesped},
You are using our Check-in express option for your upcoming stay. Great choice. Please confirm the information below is correct and update anything necessary.
arrival: Check-in time is at {horaEntrada} and check-out time is at {horaSalida}.
Please let us know what time you expect to arrive at the hotel.
We will do our best to have everything ready for you.
You will receive a notification when your room is ready.
template.foto: Please take a picture of your passport.
template.card:
Reservation Id: {{localizadorHotel}}
Check-in: {{fechaEntrada}}
Nights: {{noches}}
Room Type: {{tipoHabitacion}}
Rooms: {{habitaciones}}
Guests: {{personas}}
Price: {{precio}} {{moneda}}
template.test:
Reservation Id: {{localizadorHotel}}
Check-in: {{fechaEntrada}}
template.summary: You are about to send your check-in express request scheduled for the next {fechaEntrada} at {horaPrevistaCheckin}.Please check out the selected upgrades or ancillary services and request the check-in.

asignarTarjetaCreditoATodasLasHabitacion.title: Assign this credit card number to all rooms in the reservation

comentario.title: Special requests
comentario.placeHolder:
Type here any preferences for your stay.
We will do our best to meet your requests.

changes.title: We request a card as a guarantee for your stay. Any bookings confirmed for the stay could be charged to this credit card number, unless you change your preferred payment option at the front desk.

available.title: Upgrade requests will be confirmed based on its availability.

unavailable.title: This option is not available right now. Few hours before your arrival you will receive a notification inviting you to do the check-in express.

expired.title: Check-in express option is not available right now. Please check-in at the frontdesk.

realizado.title: Check-in for this reservation is already completed.

confirm.message: Are you sure you want to cancel your {servicioNombre} booking request

cancellation.error: It is not possible to cancel your booking request at this time. Please try it again later.

roomissue.title: Report Room Issue
roomissue.picture_description: Take a picture of the issue and give a short description. That woluld help our stuff to resolve it more quickly.

roommakeup.title: My Room
roommakeup.dontdisturb_description1: Push to activate the option for non disturb and select until what time
roommakeup.dontdisturb_description2: Our stuff will recive your request acordingly
roommakeup.cleanroom_description1: Push to send a request for cleaning your room
roommakeup.cleanroom_description2: Our stuff will recive your request acordingly

label.name: Name
label.faq: How do we use your personal info?
label.purpose: We use personal data to select personalized recommendations and for user validation purposes

messageTemplate: Hi {nombreHuesped}, we have detected that your locator has been used previously from another device. For security reasons, please fulfill the data required below. Thanks in advance.

reservation.confirm: Please make sure your booking info is correct.
reservation.success: Your booking request has been sent successfuly. Shortly you will receive the booking confirmation

error.dateRange: Sorry but your stay is over and you can not book services anymore
error.noPossible: Sorry but your booking request cannot be made.
error.nullDate: Date and time are required data
error.checkoutYaRealizado: To book services after the check-out is not possible.
error.dateValid: Sorry , but it is not possible to make reservations for this service

label.legal:
Please select when and for how many people you want to book this service. Also type any preferences we should consider.

After submitting your booking request we will do our best to confirm it back to you as soon as possible.
label.roomservice:
Please tell us when you want us to serve this room service. Also type any preferences we should consider.

After submitting your booking request we will do our best to confirm it back to you as soon as possible.

comments.title: Special Requests
comments.placeHolder: Type your preferences and we will do our best to fullfill them.

label.mustAgreeTerms: For making a reservation you must accept Terms and Conditions.
label.guaranteeText: We request a credit card to guarantee your booking. We will charge it only in case of cancellation with penalties.
label.chargeText: Payment is made through a payment gateway and the following cards will be accepted: AmericanExpress, Visa, MasterCard.
label.pciCompliant: All your credit card information is handled securely and never stored.
label.noPaymentKeys: There is a problem with the payment gateway. Please contact the Frondesk, thank you.

error.mailNotFound: No se ha encontrado ninguna reserva válida para el mail introducido

common.logoff: Are you sure you want to change your Reservation ID? Any communication with the hotel will be disabled until a new valid ID is entered
common.serviceIsUnavailable: The requested service is not available

errors.creditCardInvalid: Credit card number is not valid

common.connectionError: There is no signal. Please try it again later.
common.sync: Synchronising with the server. This operation can take several minutes...
